description: Returns the Lake Formation permissions for a specified table or database resource located at a path in Amazon S3. GetEffectivePermissionsForPath will not return databases and tables if the catalog is encrypted.

parameters.name: ResourceArn
parameters.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the resource for which you want to get permissions.

nested_items.name: Permissions
nested_items.description: A list of the permissions for the specified table or database resource located at the path in Amazon S3.

nested_items.name: Principal
nested_items.description: The Data Lake principal to be granted or revoked permissions.

nested_items.name: DataLakePrincipalIdentifier
nested_items.description: An identifier for the Lake Formation principal.

nested_items.name: Id
nested_items.description: An identifier for the catalog resource.

nested_items.name: CatalogId
nested_items.description: The identifier for the Data Catalog. By default, it is the account ID of the caller.

nested_items.name: Name
nested_items.description: The name of the database resource. Unique to the Data Catalog.

nested_items.name: CatalogId
nested_items.description: The identifier for the Data Catalog. By default, it is the account ID of the caller.

nested_items.name: DatabaseName
nested_items.description: The name of the database for the table. Unique to a Data Catalog. A database is a set of associated table definitions organized into a logical group. You can Grant and Revoke database privileges to a principal.

nested_items.name: Name
nested_items.description: The name of the table.

nested_items.name: TableWildcard
nested_items.description: A wildcard object representing every table under a database.

nested_items.name: TableWithColumns
nested_items.description: The table with columns for the resource. A principal with permissions to this resource can select metadata from the columns of a table in the Data Catalog and the underlying data in Amazon S3.

nested_items.name: CatalogId
nested_items.description: The identifier for the Data Catalog. By default, it is the account ID of the caller.

nested_items.name: DatabaseName
nested_items.description: The name of the database for the table with columns resource. Unique to the Data Catalog. A database is a set of associated table definitions organized into a logical group. You can Grant and Revoke database privileges to a principal.

nested_items.name: Name
nested_items.description: The name of the table resource. A table is a metadata definition that represents your data. You can Grant and Revoke table privileges to a principal.

nested_items.name: ColumnNames
nested_items.description: The list of column names for the table. At least one of ColumnNames or ColumnWildcard is required.
(string) ---

nested_items.name: ColumnWildcard
nested_items.description: A wildcard specified by a ColumnWildcard object. At least one of ColumnNames or ColumnWildcard is required.

nested_items.name: ExcludedColumnNames
nested_items.description: Excludes column names. Any column with this name will be excluded.
(string) ---

nested_items.name: DataLocation
nested_items.description: The location of an Amazon S3 path where permissions are granted or revoked.

nested_items.name: CatalogId
nested_items.description: The identifier for the Data Catalog where the location is registered with Lake Formation. By default, it is the account ID of the caller.

nested_items.name: ResourceArn
nested_items.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) that uniquely identifies the data location resource.

nested_items.name: DataCellsFilter
nested_items.description: A data cell filter.

nested_items.name: TableCatalogId
nested_items.description: The ID of the catalog to which the table belongs.

nested_items.name: DatabaseName
nested_items.description: A database in the Glue Data Catalog.

nested_items.name: TableName
nested_items.description: The name of the table.

nested_items.name: Name
nested_items.description: The name of the data cells filter.

nested_items.name: CatalogId
nested_items.description: The identifier for the Data Catalog. By default, the account ID. The Data Catalog is the persistent metadata store. It contains database definitions, table definitions, and other control information to manage your Lake Formation environment.

nested_items.name: TagKey
nested_items.description: The key-name for the LF-tag.

nested_items.name: TagValues
nested_items.description: A list of possible values an attribute can take.
(string) ---

nested_items.name: LFTagPolicy
nested_items.description: A list of LF-tag conditions or saved LF-Tag expressions that define a resource's LF-tag policy.

nested_items.name: CatalogId
nested_items.description: The identifier for the Data Catalog. By default, the account ID. The Data Catalog is the persistent metadata store. It contains database definitions, table definitions, and other control information to manage your Lake Formation environment.

nested_items.name: ResourceType
nested_items.description: The resource type for which the LF-tag policy applies.

nested_items.name: Expression
nested_items.description: A list of LF-tag conditions or a saved expression that apply to the resource's LF-tag policy.

nested_items.name: TagKey
nested_items.description: The key-name for the LF-tag.

nested_items.name: TagValues
nested_items.description: A list of possible values an attribute can take.
(string) ---

nested_items.name: ExpressionName
nested_items.description: If provided, permissions are granted to the Data Catalog resources whose assigned LF-Tags match the expression body of the saved expression under the provided ExpressionName.

nested_items.name: LFTagExpression
nested_items.description: LF-Tag expression resource. A logical expression composed of one or more LF-Tag key:value pairs.

nested_items.name: CatalogId
nested_items.description: The identifier for the Data Catalog. By default, the account ID.

nested_items.name: Name
nested_items.description: The name of the LF-Tag expression to grant permissions on.

nested_items.name: Condition
nested_items.description: A Lake Formation condition, which applies to permissions and opt-ins that contain an expression.

nested_items.name: Expression
nested_items.description: An expression written based on the Cedar Policy Language used to match the principal attributes.

nested_items.name: Permissions
nested_items.description: The permissions to be granted or revoked on the resource.
(string) ---

nested_items.name: PermissionsWithGrantOption
nested_items.description: Indicates whether to grant the ability to grant permissions (as a subset of permissions granted).
(string) ---

nested_items.name: AdditionalDetails
nested_items.description: This attribute can be used to return any additional details of PrincipalResourcePermissions. Currently returns only as a RAM resource share ARN.

nested_items.name: ResourceShare
nested_items.description: A resource share ARN for a catalog resource shared through RAM.
(string) ---

nested_items.name: LastUpdated
nested_items.description: The date and time when the resource was last updated.

nested_items.name: LastUpdatedBy
nested_items.description: The user who updated the record.

nested_items.name: NextToken
nested_items.description: A continuation token, if this is not the first call to retrieve this list.
